title: I need a pen whose ink should disappear after some days. Where can I buy such kind of pen? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is an Red light invisible ink pen, when you use it to write on the card, these infrared ink will disappear. But only use on red cards. When you use infrared contact lenses, you can see the ink mark on the card. Do n’t use it for gambling, it is easy to find by others. another one : Fluorescent ink has fluorescent agent. When it encounters ultraviolet light (more sunlight, fluorescent lamp and mercury lamp), it will produce fluorescent effect and emit white light, which makes the color look dazzling fluorescent

There you go, invisible ink pen:http://m.shopclues.com/invisible-ink-with-pen-uv-light-pack-of-3-pen.html. And I have noticed that some of the highlighter ink I used on my text books long ago have faded. So, probably you could get yourself the highlighter ink filled in the ink pen if it suits you well. Or why not just use pencil and erase it later. :P
